name: chris allen
text: Loved getting my pizza from here.  Then one day they were gone.  Wish there was another one close by.

name: Maria Luiza M Borges
text: First time in this location. It did not smell like a pizza place... They do wear gloves to prepare your pizza. But I saw one employee touching her phone wearing them and back to the pizza... …More

name: Chuck Bjork
text: Has a drive through, for when you don't want to drag the kids and the dog inside.  They have been accurate and on-time every time I've called ahead for pick-up. …More

name: Bill Swank
text: Yeah this is Bill and we go in there every week. And usually they said they couldn't sell a pizza after 8 but they've been known to make a pizza and set it to the side and my wife was almost to the store so we are going to go somewhere else thank you very much. By the way it was 3 minutes till 8.

name: Shelby Goodman - Teboe
text: It's a Friday night the 4th, it's only 7:30 and they are closed. Yet online it says they close at 9pm. Currently driving to Carmel to get pizza tonight. This place has gone down hill the past 3 months.

name: Chris K
text: Three strikes and you are out is my motto! This Papa Murphy's has the most rude staff I have experienced in a Pizza establishment. They are curt  and have the general attitude that they are being bothered when you are waiting for service or …More

name: Sam Cloud
text: Great food and awesome service.

name: Brock Jones
text: Friendly staff, quick service, and the drive thru pickup window is nice

name: Richard Bourgerie
text: I've tried many Pizzas, and haven't found many that compare with Charlotte's and Lou Malnati's when I lived in Chicago, but Papa Murphy's compares very well. Even though you have to cook it yourself, it's worth it to get good pizza and the price is a real deal. I like the Delite, thin crust.

name: Randy Mayhue
text: Always good, usually pretty quick

name: Kory Barnes
text: The pizza is great especially for costing about as much as frozen pizza. Staff is always friendly and super quick.

name: Pam Tolle
text: Pizza was wonderful. Really miss them being in Kokomo

name: Brooke Jones
text: Staff was rude. Didn’t notice our pizza was ready and the man rudely said “hey love birds your pizza is done”, while we were standing their having a casual conversation waiting on our pizza and the man sat it down without announcing it.

name: Amy Preer
text: Kinda ,friendly ,clean good people fast

name: Tasmine Lukashik-Calkins
text: Love that its fresh and take home to bake

name: Kurt Beard
text: Great flavor for an inexpensive pizza.

name: J Guff
text: One of the best values, great food, great management, and great food.

name: Thomas Gang
text: Now closed up

name: Erin A
text: Love this place

name: Mike Ferrebee
text: No longer open ☹️

name: Old Goat
text: They are closed up as 12-28-18.

name: Marvin Davis
text: Cowboy thin crust.

name: Ron Long
text: Call in or wait ten dollar Tuesday for large pizza

text: Great pizza.

name: Missy Lacey
text: Great prices on some yummy pizzas!

text: Staff did not weigh out pizza did not get as much cheese as supposed to
